content: Has Ms. Warren looked into her remarks from 1986? Do people change? Have words been taken out of context and inflamed by bigotry? I think Dr. King would be appauled by Ms. Warren.This is the same woman who has lied about her heritage for decades.She is a whining temper tantrum throwing hypocrite. I believe the Democratic party needs to rethink the obstructionist pattern they have set. There are at least 10 senate seats up for re election in 2018 and the American people might stay angry enough to vote them out of the swamp.
